description: The story of a young woman's obsession with a man who is good at being charming.
keywords: female nudity,female frontal nudity,female rear nudity,college,love
name: Tell Me Lies

review.name: Deserves a higher rating
review.reviewBody: For its genre this show is an 8 for me. The story is realistic, told in an interesting way, the steamy parts give it a nice spice and it's overall a good drama that doesn't get dull. The actors are great. I binged it in 3 days it's been very addictive to watch. I love the way they mix different perspectives and different points in time. It's really well made to convey the story and make you feel it, understand the characters and walk in their shoes. I'm glad there will be a next season and looking forward to it. Overall a great watch if you are into that type and genre. If you are not you will probably not like it, but hey, don't spoil its rating because it's not your cup of tea.

trailer.description: Follows a tumultuous but intoxicating relationship as it unfolds over the course of 8 years. When Lucy Albright and Stephen DeMarco meet at college, they are at that formative age when seemingly mundane choices lead the way to irrevocable consequences. Although their relationship begins like any typical campus romance, they quickly fall into an addictive entanglement that will permanently alter not only their lives, but the lives of everyone around them.
trailer.name: Official Trailer
